name: 3D Escape from hotel
description:
Walk as you please in a full 3D space that is unlike any other escape game!

A cinematic world with stunningly beautiful graphics!

Trapped in an abandoned hotel, your goal is to escape from the room!

Hint function for beginners! Everyone can enjoy the escape room!

☆How to play☆

Explore the 3D space freely and touch the objects you like to interact with them!

☆Languages Supported☆

・English

・Japanese

[3D Escape from hotel] uses Unreal® Engine. Unreal® is a trademark or registered trademark of Epic Games, Inc. in the United States of America and elsewhere. Unreal® Engine, Copyright 1998 – , Epic Games, Inc. All rights reserved.
